review: if you like stardew valley youll probably like this

similar enough to their other game my time in portia this one is also easy to learn and fun to play it even references some things from the other game some of the cut scenes are a little choppy and seem to jump around in odd ways

after my obsession with stardew valley started to falter a bit came my time at portia after mtap came my time at sandrock its been my second goto game for a good couple years by now  i thought it was an overall upgrade from portia and i adored the heck out of that too ive been with since the beginning and honestly its well worth it in my opinion
this game is exactly what i needed
very fun game lots of things to do
i played like 20 hours in two days i cant even say if i recommend it for real its just very addicting
its impossible to make a good looking character but thats okay because they almost immediately give you a hat to hide your face
awsome game d

game is cute relaxing for a change but i had a glitch that blocked my progress i never got the grinder i checked the old mail nothing never arrived checked other bug reports and is a common problem the game is from 2023 why is still not fixed i really liked the game sadly cant keep on at least on this save
soo good cant wait for mtae

i absolutely love this game i was actually not expecting to like it so much it is more stardew valley then i expected and the theme of the game is better than i expected initially i thought it would just be us southwest but theres way more too it i wish i had friends to play this game because i think it be an 1110 experience  tldr game is really fun and fairly cheap i would 100 recommend this game

cute graphics friendships that seem to matter to the game collect  build this is a cosy game that really delivers on lore which i love the collectbuildquest management system feels linear enough to not be bewildering but creative and open enough to not be dull
im am super new in this series and so far it seems to be exactly what i was looking for

another amazing entry in the my time series looking forward to the next game the characters are fun and unique and the game has unique resource gathering rules that make it feel like youre in a real town thats struggling to keep on its feet
1010 game
this is a really great game i believe anyone who enjoys farming life sims cozy games would really enjoy playing any of the my time series looking forward to my time at evershine
if you liked portia you will like sandrockjust give yourself a few hours to get used to it

its fun and a good sequel to my time at portia but the story line triggers are too delayed i had a fully developed farm with all technologies and found myself just spinning wheels waiting for the events to trigger finally gave up and will never finish the game but its still a recommended purchase
ive completed this game on console and had to get it on pc one of my favorite series and will 100 get the new one when it comes out
i love this series of games  my time at portia and my time at sandrock are really relazing and enjoyable i cant wait until the 3rd comes out my time at evershine love them all
i have 144 hours in one playthrough  this is a great cozy game not really any branching plots so one is all you need and its totally worth it
logan my beloved
good game it is fun

it is better in solo play than multi because there is story and plot and more development with the npc that being said we still play multi because its much easier and faster to advance there are perks like a money tree a skill to get free yakmel rides all over and a whistle to summon your mount but downsides like no sand wall for your workshop or extremely costly machine upgrades for your workshop my husband got this for me for my birthday
this game is great gameplay is fun and intuitive great story so good i played through twice dont pass this up
very cool stresfull sometimes but fun
good game fun to play
my favorite cozy sim in the world fun characters funny dialogue and a whole lotta heart
amazing amazing game  love the art style the mechanics the story and everything else

its a fun game its a lot like a first person view of stardew valley i havent played nearly as many hours as it says because i keep leaving it running while paused i feel like im most of the way through the main story
love this game it is awesome it has a heart felt story great characters and is just a fun all around experience hi highly recommend it
life changing game
its polished tons of content and mini games but man having no automation in the end game with such grind should be illegal
super fun to play multiplayer  rebuilding the town has been great   cant wait to replay in single player and learn even more of the story behind the people and town

sandrock has engaging characters plenty to explore a lot to accomplish and the majority of it can be done at your leisure the voice acting is solid the quests fun and sometimes goofy and you can mine to your hearts content i highly appreciate being able to save at any time there are some unpolished moments but i havent encountered any game breaking bugs or glitches

i was not prepared for how much i would like this game the world is immersive and the story is good theres plenty of sidequests and characters to get to know i did skim over some of the tutorials meaning i missed out on a decent chunk of content until further into my play through but it was still amazing before i realized that i would highly recommend this game for people looking for a cozy game with a detailed story

one of the very best craftinglife sim games heck game period ive ever played fantastic smooth gameplay experience engaging characters and a storyline that im still not completely finished with after 94 hours of gameplay  but im still invested in every second i love this game so much

ive been having a lot of fun with this game theres a decent amount of clunk but i honestly found it endearing and didnt mind it i enjoy the characters and dialogue and the story genuinely caught me by surprise not worth full price i think but definitely worth grabbing on sale

would really love a my time at sandrock 2 please i know itll never happen but this one hit so different from portia i got way too attached to almost all of the villagers especially andy logan haru unsuur justice trudy qi the list would keep going on
this game is under the quote the grind never stops

the game is super entertaining and creative in my opinion the story line is exciting and the tasks are difficult enough to keep your attention the music is also really nice and sets the scene in a nice way i would definitely recommend if you like story line games like this
fun and relaxing
loved everything about this game super fun and cute 1010
i love this game raaaaah
its great
literally the best game ever i usually write meme reviews but this time its genuinely so real   very cozy very good story and goofs d pen my beloved come back home 3

i can play this game all day well i could if it was possible haha but i was hoping for more dlc for owen mainly he is a popular character but he seems to be kind of brushed under the rug i hope more dlc comes and not just outfits more story to deepen the game but it wont stop me from playing until i cant no more

love this game i had it on my switch and it was very glitchy there  much better on pc i am still able to use my switch remote with relatively few problems every once in awhile i need to restart the game for reasons related to my remote as well as the game starts to have interesting abnormal things happen  more entertaining then not just takes a minute to reboot then all is good i cannot wait for evershine to happen super love this whole series
game fun
i played on the switch first and it felt a bit wonky and became disinterested decided to give it a try on pc and love it so much more

fun game definitely put more effort into the depth of the characters compared to the first game however the unskippable rambling you can accidentally get stuck in during the end of the game was a dirty trick that long overstayed its welcome to be funny i had to force quit the game before i literally died of boredom
after almost 140 hours i still have not finished the game i bought it on sale but knowing now how much i enjoy it id have gladly paid full price it really is that good
i love this game
i love this series i love the quality of life improvements the devs made since portia i have played so many hours on this game and love it
single player has been really enjoyable so far havent gotten to play multiplayer much yet
i milked my yakmel

sandrock has a rather steep learning curve even for a farmingadventure sim with a lot of content to find time for digging into and it doesnt handle it all perfectly with some odd design choices here and there but once you get into the groove it has a lot more to offer than some of its ilk and some satisfying gameplay routines the writing is also an unusually strong point for its genre
whoever voiced cooper thank you made my day
cozy many hours of gameplay
its a fun and involved game lots of content good graphics
got this game for my switch and became hooked would recommend the pc version over switch 100 better such a fun game relaxing game worth your time and money

for me one of the best games ive played in a while ive spend 140 hours in my first ever playthrough and i loved very second of it the characters the world building the story everything was created with so much love and passion anyone thinking about buying and playing the game do it
i love the mta series great way to escape from reality
adorable game that always puts a smile on your face
well be aware that you can dive fast into a spiraling passion for the game mechanics

good game but still unable to add  rooms to my house like the game play and buildings  planting and fishing is a mess but adding rooms to your house is nuts all in all i do like the game play i buy ready made houses to counter act adding rooms to my house the game is enjoyable to play
fun game
love the game
good fun run around and whack some rocks
chores the game
i love this game been eyeing it for a little and finally broke down and got it really great choice highly recommend
its fun the pacing is a little off but the worldbuilding and characters are very entertaining

i love this game its a cozy game thats not repetitive or boring and the best part is is that you dont have to farm and if you do farm you dont have to water your plants every day i love the cast of characters and i enjoy the crafting aspect of the game very much its definitely worth the money
100 recommend i love the story the art and all the craftingfarming you can do take it slow and enjoy the pace it is a very fun game to play
amazing game  i loved my time at portia and this is a great improvement from there  cant wait for evershine
fang

oopsie i kinda forgot about the whole bedtime thing while playing at least it was more than worth the money i love the characters so far and love the gameplay loop if i didnt have to work tomorrow id probably still be playing instead of typing this
if you are a fan of games like stardew valley story of seasons and more you will enjoy this game this has more combat in it as a heads up though i think its fairly approachable
you can romance cowboy 3
i dont think im even close to finishing the game yet even when im at 76 hours into one save i really enjoy this game

this is such a fantastic game ive sunk well over 100 hours into it and not once was i bored the story is really good the characters have so much heart one of the best slice of life games ive ever played cant wait for evershine
great game with great story
one of my favorite farm sim games while also never giving a damn about farming recommend this for anyone into the rune factory games or others like it its just amazing

this game is evolved version of portia the story improved the style improved etc it is a bit more challenging compare to portia since it is in a land where there are limited resources after having played portia you can see how the dev worked to get the timeline of portia story to match up with the sandrock story highly recommend
i love it

i love it while i enjoyed portia the art style and characters in sandrock were more enjoyable it was fun hanging out with them and finding giftsraising affection was way easier than in portia there were a lot of quality of life improvements from the last game and way more attractive bachelors in my opinion havent made it to the end yet may restart when i have time but its pretty relaxing and fun to play

the writing in this game is incredibly smart and funny which is something i was expecting from a game like this sandrock has an insane amount of content packed into its single player campaign and it runs flawlessly on steam deck was expecting to play it for a handful of hours but havent put it down since starting

super super fun goofy and surprisingly big game basically if you liked portia this one is an upgrade in almost every aspect theres some cool lore to explore as well lots of lovable characters and a nice story to follow a few bugs here and there but most of them were pretty funny graphical bugs so i didnt mind much
i mean surely the play time speaks for itself love this game

i normally dont like farming games but this game is amazing story is great combat is fun i love the fact you can have relationships and even have children im not sure how far i am in the story but i wish the map was bigger maybe i havent unlocked the whole map yet they should add a way to tell off yan he is a garbage npc i wish your character could talk just like in my time at protia

my time at sandrock isnt just a game its a whole world i fell into and didnt want to leave i love the characters so much i could tell you each of their quirks like theyre my actual neighbors theyve got personalities that stick with you stories that tug at your heart and little habits that make the town feel so alive every time i play it doesnt feel like im just farming or crafting i feel like im going home
i playing game like this enjoyable and a lot of stuff you can do in this game the story is enjoyable and unexpected too

a truly truly great game  excellent plot writing with unique and memorable characters this game took me on a rollercoaster of emotions that i really wasnt expecting  throw in some great humour and a charming gameplay loop and honestly this ranks as one of my favourite games of all time
